title: La Vuelta a España 2021 Standings after Stage 18
content:
General Classification / Red Jersey 

The Queen Stage of the Vuelta gave us further confirmation of who the best climbers are in the race. Red jersey wearer Primož Roglič never looked in difficulty and finished second on the stage behind the eventual winner, Miguel Angel Lopez. Strong rides from Egan Bernal, Enric Mas and Jack Haig means that the top 4 in the GC remains the same after stage 18. It was a hard day for Guillaume Martin who dropped out of the top 5.
